title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #82
body:
## Date and Time

April 12, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/) 
  - Mainnet Shadow fork 
  - [Pari's Twitter thread](https://twitter.com/parithosh_j/status/1513129881927884801) 
- [Shanghai specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md), [Tracker](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/projects/1)

### 2. Element Finance airdrop [details here](https://mirror.xyz/0x3fcAf7DDf64E6e109B1e2A5CC17875D4a5993F39/bctuLRkf7oBL4mMJ9lPf0y0blFjBDslTUfUL0CEk1gc)

### 3. Events & hackathon
- Devconnect [Schedule](https://devconnect.org/schedule) Amsterdam, Netherlands 18-25 April 2022
  - [OG council](https://www.ogcouncil.com/)
  - Governance forum on 24th April in Amsterdam during Devconnect. ( 10:30am-12 pm )
  - [Amsterdam:OG Council](https://medium.com/ethereum-magicians/join-our-upcoming-event-in-amsterdam-og-council-aa8355709557)
-  Devfolio
    - [Manthan](https://manthan.devfolio.co/) - March 30 - May 14, 2022
    - [ETHWMN Fellowship](https://ethwmn.devfolio.co/) 

### 4. ECH updates
- Ethereum Cat Herders Update [(March 2022)](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ethereum-cat-herders-update-53-8afadcda6d4a)
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - Need Ruby dev
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
   - ECH Medium to Mirror 
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH New Joiners Meeting April 2022
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
   - [EIP-3855: PUSH0 instruction with Alex Beregszaszi, Hugo De la cruz, Paweł Bylica](https://youtu.be/AIuJg6pkJxs)
   - [EIP-3860: Limit and meter initcode with  Paweł Bylica, Alex Beregszaszi](https://youtu.be/PJQdhPR5BJ0)
   - [EIP-4895: Beacon chain push withdrawals as operations with Alex stokes](https://youtu.be/CcL9RJBljUs)
   - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- Discuss issues with meeting notes. [Ref.](https://discord.com/channels/916516304972824576/916713868619833454/960205861991612476)
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 135](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/509)
  - Consensus meeting notes 85
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 53
  - EIP editors apprentice meetings [15 recording](https://youtu.be/52WuA82y7I4); Meeting 16 planned on Tuesday, Apr 19, 2022, [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/124)

### 5. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 81](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20081.md)

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - April 26, 2022.
